message: I think this is a fair split, considering I get to make the first offer.  What do you say?
Let's be fair, I took the 5% hit, I think 60-40 is more than reasonable.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not going to take a 40% cut.  Let's split it 65/35 this time.
I've taken a 9.75% hit due to inflation, I think 55-45 is a reasonable compromise.
